title: Graphics and windowing system
body: It would be nice if I can build and run Qt apps written for Ubuntu on Windows. It doesn't have to be smooth.

comments.body: That could be done (smoothly too) if you had an x11 server running locally. Microsoft wouldn't have to write one, it would just have to be present. You might even be able to pull this off without Microsoft's help if you just installed the cygwin x11 server and not the rest of the cygwin package.
